[`func moveSubranges(RangeSet<Self.Index>, to: Self.Index) -> Range<Self.Index>`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/movesubranges(_:to:))Moves the elements in the given subranges to just before the element at the specified index.[`func partition(by: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows -> Self.Index`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/partition(by:)-2s919)Reorders the elements of the collection such that all the elements that match the given predicate are after all the elements that don’t match.[`func partition(by: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows -> Self.Index`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/partition(by:)-706dh)Reorders the elements of the collection such that all the elements that match the given predicate are after all the elements that don’t match.[`func removeSubranges(RangeSet<Self.Index>)`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/removesubranges(_:)-k50b)Removes the elements at the given indices.[`func reverse()`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/reverse())Reverses the elements of the collection in place.[`func shuffle()`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/shuffle())Shuffles the collection in place.[`func shuffle<T>(using: inout T)`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/shuffle(using:))Shuffles the collection in place, using the given generator as a source for randomness.[`func sort()`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/sort())Sorts the collection in place.[`func sort(by: (Self.Element, Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/sort(by:))Sorts the collection in place, using the given predicate as the comparison between elements.[`func swapAt(Self.Index, Self.Index)`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/swapat(_:_:))Exchanges the values at the specified indices of the collection.[`func withContiguousMutableStorageIfAvailable<R>((inout UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>) throws -> R) rethrows -> UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Self.Element>) throws -> R) rethrows -> R?`](/documentation/swift/arrayslice/withcontiguousmutablestorageifavailable(_:)-5vekj)Executes a closure on the collection’s
